Chambers ga aka God kwuo "ife anya, ihe ndụ, na ubochi ife anya na agba egbu aka n'aka n'aka ebe a."
Chambers, ọ bụ onye agostịk, agwa a na ewu ezi ọtụtụ "ọ na ọtụtụ" na "ọnye ji ọnye ji."
Nke a story a ga-esọrọ n'operanya French, Camille Saint-Saens, bụ ihe a na-eme "ọnwa ya dịka na ubochi ya na ile n'ime drugụ na ọ bụ ụlọ Aịapan."
N'ime naani, nwata mmiri ama-aka na egwu kọọrọọ nwetarị ụmụ nkụ-ọhụrụ aka na egwu, n'ime naanị, nwata mmiri ama-aka na egwu kwesịrị ewelu aka a na-agbaa nwata mmiri ama-aka.

Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively.

Igbo: Onye aka Speaker ewu House, Newt Gingrich, onye owelle Texas, Rick Perry, na nwanyi ọma Congresswoman, Michele Bachmann, ji ewetara nke fourth, nke fifth, na nke sixth, dum.
Ihe ha na-eme mma, Gingrich ji ama Santorum, nke a ha ama ụtọ Romney, nke a na-eme akwụkwọ anya na-eme ihe ojoo adịghị ebea Iowa ma-aka Gingrich.

Perry nwere mkpa a mara okwa sị "iri aka Chites na ihe na-esi aka aka echi afo ugwu ewu, ji aka ewu ihe na-acho aka aka aka ihe mere ya na onu oge ụlọ ụlọ South Carolina." N'aka nke ọ bụala, o nweghi ike ya na ewu ihe mere ya.

Igbo Translation: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. However, he later said that he would not leave the race.

Bachmann, a who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
Igbo: Bachmann, nke gbasara Ames Straw Poll nke August, chọrọ ebe oge nke ya.

Igbo: O wu aka na-ele anya n'ihu ụfọ ịhe ọ bụ na-eme ọrụ ọ bụ ịhe ọnwa ọbụla. N'ọnọ ọrụ ọ bụlụ, Bieber ji aha na-abịa: "[W]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."

Australia Mitchell Gourley ji aka eleventh n'aka ugboo nke ugwu Super-G ndi nwoke. Czech Oldrich Jelinek ji aka isixteenth n'aka ugboo nke ugwu Super-G ndi nwanyi.

Note: In Igbo, there is no direct translation for the word "men's" or "women's". Instead, the phrase "ndi nwoke" (for men) or "ndi nwanyi" (for women) is added to clarify the gender. Also, the word "competitor" is translated as "athlete" in Igbo.
Arly Velasquez ni Mexico kwesiri ofụrụ fifteenth onye nwanyi ọ́kụchị Super-G. New Zealand kwesiri Adam Hall kwesiri ninth onye obu ọ́kụchị Super-G.

Australians, idea “flat white” coffee ọhụrụ. “Short black” nke a ọhụrụ “espresso”, cappuccino ma o nweghị ike anya n'ihi ụbọchị, na ụzọ tea na ewu siri.
Igbo: Hot chocolote ebe a na-eme Belgian kwadoro. Nkwu ọhụrụ ebe a na-eme ịkpa, onye ọma ọrụ ọnụ.

(Translation: Many trips are made to the reef all year round, and injuries due to any of these causes on the reef are rare.)

"Safari" nke ọdụ nke ubochi na-eme na ubochi aha ji na-agba ụdịrị ọhịa Afirika nke ọrụka, ọhụrụgharị na-agba ewu ụgbọ.

Mmadụ nke nchịghị nwere ike, enweghị ihe owula n'aka na-agwa n'aka, nkele n'elu igwe March ga-eme ga-abụ ịhe ndị corona virus nke nchịghị nwere ike, na-agwa ebe a na-eme Olympics na-eme July 2020.
